entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
